languages.text: "Боюсь, что нет, господин. По моим данным они решили уклониться от битвы, разгоревшейся в Просторе". {n}В почтительном голосе прорезается сухая нота.{/n}
"I am afraid not. According to the information in my possession, they withdrew from the battle raging in the Expanse." {n}The Lord Inquisitor's deferential tone now carries a dry edge.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Боюсь, что нет, господин. По моим данным они решили уклониться от битвы, разгоревшейся в Просторе". {n}В почтительном голосе прорезается сухая нота.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I'm afraid not, sir. According to the information I have, they decided to shirk from the battle raging in the Expanse." {n}There's a new dryness in his respectful voice.{/n}
"I'm afraid not, sir. According to the information I have, they decided to shirk from the battle raging in the Expanse." {n}There's a new dryness in his respectful voice.{/n}
"I'm afraid not, sir. According to the information I have, they decided to shirk from the battle raging in the Expanse." {n}There's a new dryness in his respectful voice.{/n}
"I'm afraid not, sir. According to the information I have, they decided to shirk from the battle raging in the Expanse." {n}There's a new dryness in his respectful voice.{/n}

"I'm afraid not, my lord. According to the information in my possession, they decided to turn tail on the battle raging in the Expanse." {n}The Lord Inquisitor's deferential tone now carries a dry edge.{/n}
"I am afraid not. According to the information in my possession, they withdrew from the battle raging in the Expanse." {n}The Lord Inquisitor's deferential tone now carries a dry edge.{/n}

languages.text: “我恐怕并不清楚。根据我掌握的情报，他们在科罗努斯扩区的战场上临阵脱逃。”{n}大审判官恭敬的声音中多了一丝干涩。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am afraid not. According to the information in my possession, they withdrew from the battle raging in the Expanse." {n}The Lord Inquisitor's deferential tone now carries a dry edge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我恐怕并不清楚，大人。根据我得到的消息，他们打算逃避在科罗努斯扩区的战斗。”{n}他恭敬的声音中多了一丝干涩。{/n}

languages.text: 「残念ながら、そうではない。私の手元にある情報によれば、彼らはエクスパンスで繰り広げられている戦いからは撤退したようですな」{n}ロード・インクィジターの丁寧な口調は今やそっけないものになっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am afraid not. According to the information in my possession, they withdrew from the battle raging in the Expanse." {n}The Lord Inquisitor's deferential tone now carries a dry edge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「残念ながら、そうではない。私の手元にある情報によれば、彼らはエクスパンスで繰り広げられている戦いからは撤退したようですな」{n}ロード・インクィジターの丁寧な口調は今やそっけないものになっている。{/n}

languages.text: «Me temo que no. Según la información de la que dispongo, se retiraron de la batalla en la Extensión». {n}El tono respetuoso del Lord Inquisidor se vuelve más seco.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am afraid not. According to the information in my possession, they withdrew from the battle raging in the Expanse." {n}The Lord Inquisitor's deferential tone now carries a dry edge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Me temo que no, señor. Según la información de la que dispongo, decidieron eludir la batalla que se libra en la Extensión». {n}Hay sequedad en su voz.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich fürchte nicht. Meinen Informationen zufolge haben sie sich aus der Schlacht in der Ausdehnung zurückgezogen." {n}Der ehrfürchtige Ton des Großinquisitors trägt nun eine gewisse Schärfe in sich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am afraid not. According to the information in my possession, they withdrew from the battle raging in the Expanse." {n}The Lord Inquisitor's deferential tone now carries a dry edge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte nicht, Sir. Meinen Informationen zufolge haben sie entschieden, sich vor der Schlacht zu drücken, die in der Ausdehnung tobt." {n}Eine neue Trockenheit liegt in seiner respektvollen Stimme.{/n}

languages.text: « J'ai bien peur que non. D'après mes informations, ils se sont retirés des combats qui font rage dans les Étendues, » {n}dit-il sur un ton toujours respectueux, mais plus sec.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am afraid not. According to the information in my possession, they withdrew from the battle raging in the Expanse." {n}The Lord Inquisitor's deferential tone now carries a dry edge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'ai bien peur que non, mon seigneur. D'après mes informations, ils ont décidé de tourner le dos aux combats qui font rage dans les Étendues, {n}dit-il sur un ton toujours respectueux, mais plus sec.{/n}

languages.text: "Maalesef bilmiyorum. Elimdeki malumata göre Enginlik'teki muharebeden çekilmişler." {n}Lord Engizisyoncu'nun umursamaz üslubu, kuru bir hâl alıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am afraid not. According to the information in my possession, they withdrew from the battle raging in the Expanse." {n}The Lord Inquisitor's deferential tone now carries a dry edge.{/n}
